pr_title: [BEAM-9980] use ALL_SUPPORTED_VERSIONS for constant SUPPORTED_CONTAINER_TASKS for python

timeline.bodyText:
How about we simplify this to:
SUPPORTED_CONTAINER_TASKS = ALL_SUPPORTED_VERSIONS.collect {"py${it.replace('.', '')}"}
timeline.author: tvalentyn

replies.bodyText: Ah it would be better, thanks.
replies.author: lazylynx
